20101221070945.000|20101221070948.000|CC1|TONIGHT.

20101221070949.000|20101221070949.000|CC1|62-YEAR-OLD PHYLLIS BIN.        
20101221070949.000|20101221070950.000|CC1|SHE HAD JUST EATEN DINNER WITH  
20101221070950.000|20101221070951.000|CC1|FRIENDS AT A NEARBY RESTAURANT

20101221071016.000|20101221071019.000|CC1|ACCUSED OF?                     
20101221071019.000|20101221071020.000|CC1|>> JUST GOT AWAY FROM US.       
20101221071020.000|20101221071020.000|CC1|ELLEN: PAUL WADLEY WALKED INTO A
20101221071020.000|20101221071021.000|CC1|FULLERTON COURTHOUSE WITH HIS   
20101221071021.000|20101221071022.000|CC1|WIFE AND DAUGHTER BY HIS SIDE
